// for this month bill import React, { useState, useRef } from "react"; import { Link } from "react-router-dom"; import { getAttendance } from '../../actions/attendance_actions' function PreviousAttendance() { const [sortBy, setSortBy] = useState("0"); const myRef = useRef(null) return (
Previous Attendance From MM-YYYY to MM-YYYY
{/* boostrap table for all the users , room no , current bill added */}
# Year Month | Users Go to
1 2021 December See
2 2021 November See
3 2021 October
); } export default PreviousAttendance;
